Title: Occupation
Plot: Tigh, Tyrol and Anders lead the Resistance on New Caprica to increasingly deadly attacks against the Cylons. Kara finds herself trapped in a new life with Leoben Conoy, and Duck makes a fateful decision.Meanwhile on Galactica, Adama struggles with the question of whether to return to New Caprica to mount a rescue attempt.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
